content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position(x=-9.5, y=-0.5) to (x=0.5, y=6.5)
Consists of the following entities:
*   OffshorePump at position (x=-9.5, y=-0.5)
*   Boiler at position (x=-5.0, y=2.5)
*   SteamEngine at position (x=0.5, y=6.5)
*   PipeGroup connecting OffshorePump to Boiler (positions: x=-8.5 y=-0.5, x=-7.5 y=-0.5, x=-6.5 y=0.5, x=-7.5 y=0.5, x=-5.5 y=0.5)
*   PipeGroup
